data.text: -You guys, it is the weekend,

translation.text: -Các bạn, đó là cuối tuần,

data.text: But with Mother's Day just two days away,

translation.text: rất nhiều người đang mua sắm cho thẻ hoàn hảo đó.

data.text: And while there are lots of good choices,

data.text: there are also some very unpopular cards out there.

translation.text: Đầu tiên, thẻ này nói,

data.text: "Mom, you're always right there."

data.text: Gosh.
